title: veigar like ....his w is not right
body: every 50 stacks of his passive should give him a 10% cooldown on that ability which means that at 500 stacks he will git a 100% cooldown redustion on it ...yes i know that its not relly possible to a degree in a regular game but i tested the theory and i need over 1000% ...thats not right .... is it

replies.body:
wold for wold is every 50 stacks of phenomeanl evil reduce dark matter's cooldown by 10% (currently 0$)......how is it multiplicative....every 50 stacks .....so 

50...10%
100 ...20%
150...30%
200...40%...
idk about you but thats how it is worded????



no??

[You can see the expected values at every level by looking on the Veigar page of the League wiki.](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Veigar)

The expected cooldown at 500 stacks is 2.79 seconds.
It is multiplicative, not additive. Which is why it is every 50, not linear.
